name: Develop Welding School Acquisition Strategy (6-Month Plan)
notes: Define 6-month acquisition plan: target list (tiered), outreach cadence, offer structure (bulk pricing + school program), KPI dashboard (leads, replies, conversions), and a weekly execution checklist. Output: 1–2 page strategy + timeline.

name: Prepare and Print New Batch of Insert Pages
notes: Confirm final copy + sizing chart, choose paper stock, print quantity, and vendor. Include QR to sizing/guide page. Output: printed inserts + packed for next shipping run (with count recorded).

name: Review and Update Glove Insert Brochure
notes: Audit current brochure: branding, product benefits, care instructions, warranty/returns note, and CTA. Update visuals + QR code links. Output: final PDF ready for print and GitHub/Drive upload.

name: Get to a stock order amount, share it here (1898 talks)
notes: Calculate next order quantity using current inventory, forecasted sales, lead times (gloves/boxes), and safety buffer. Output: recommended order qty by size/model + cost estimate to share in 1898 talks.

name: Inventory & timeline (log sticker count; gloves ~10 days, boxes ~20 days)
notes: Create quick inventory log: stickers count, gloves on hand by size, boxes on hand, and ETA trackers (gloves ~10d, boxes ~20d). Output: single source of truth + update cadence (daily/2x weekly).

name: Weston’s Care Package (send discount code + larger replacement gloves Size 10+)
notes: Generate unique discount code, pack replacement gloves (Size 10+), include thank-you note + request for feedback/photos. Output: shipped package + tracking saved in notes/CRM.

name: Evaluate 28-pair Stanton V2 samples → decide on 150-pair production run
notes: Review V2 sample set: fit, stitching, heat resistance, cuff comfort, defects rate, and tester feedback. Decide go/no-go for 150-pair run. Output: decision + list of required tweaks sent to maker.

name: Ship heavy-duty blue gloves to Brent Bailey Forge for testing/feedback
notes: Prepare tester package with gloves + feedback checklist (fit, dexterity, durability, heat). Include return/replace instructions and request short video review. Output: shipped + follow-up date scheduled.

name: Send large-sized gloves to Victor (artist) for bone design illustration
notes: Send large glove sample + references for bone design placement and style guidelines. Confirm deliverables (vector + mockup). Output: shipped sample + design timeline agreed.

name: Order from Spike (China) 3x5 vinyl banners w/ grommets
notes: Finalize banner design, confirm vinyl quality, grommet placement, quantity, shipping method, and ETA. Output: PO placed + proof approved + tracking stored.

name: Benchmarking & Apron Procurement: Calavera Toolworks vs. Sage Customs
notes: Compare aprons on materials, FR performance, comfort, lead time, wholesale pricing, and branding options. Output: recommendation + sample purchase (if needed) + final supplier decision.

name: Get a banner to Caleb Welder 1898
notes: Deliver banner + brief usage instructions (photos/video ask). Confirm address and event timing. Output: banner delivered + request 3 photos + 1 short clip for socials.

name: Get Paul all the costs
notes: Compile cost breakdown: gloves COGS, packaging, shipping, inserts, stickers, banners, samples, and tooling. Output: simple cost sheet + margin ranges by channel (DTC/wholesale).

name: Send Updated Straps and Smaller Gloves (waist strap, reinforced strap, latest straps, smaller gloves for students)
notes: Prepare package with updated strap set + smaller student gloves. Include change log of improvements and feedback checklist. Output: shipped + follow-up reminder to collect feedback.

name: Kids Welding Gloves Sizing Research
notes: Collect sizing data (hand width/length) across ages 8–18, map to glove sizes, define size chart and fit guidance. Output: final sizing table + recommendations for prototype dimensions.

name: Welding School Outreach Campaign
notes: Build outreach list (5+ schools), craft email/DM templates, define offer (school pricing + samples), and track replies. Output: outreach sent to first batch + follow-up schedule.

name: Interactividad del Task Management
notes: Implement CRUD completo (crear/editar/borrar), sync estable con GitHub API, manejo de UTF-8 (•, →, ’), y logs de errores. Output: app funcional + tasks.json consistente.

name: Website Task Management Page
notes: Polish UI: sorting, filters, responsive table, note wrapping, and edit modal. Output: production-ready GitHub Pages page reading/writing tasks.json.

name: Write blog info: wholesale bearings (brand differences, general info, etc.)
notes: Draft blog outline, compare brands, explain use cases and buying tips. Include FAQ + internal links. Output: 1 long-form post ready for review/publish.

name: Record high-quality product video
notes: Create shot list: close-ups, fit demo, durability/heat use case, and testimonials. Record + edit with captions. Output: 30–60s hero video + 3 short clips.

name: Buy some FR shirts from Benchmark FR
notes: Pick sizes, order 1–2 options, test comfort/fit with apron use. Output: recommendation on whether to stock/partner or keep for internal use.

name: Rotating display case / find continuous-spin turntable for 1898 welding gloves
notes: Find a continuous spin turntable, evaluate size/weight capacity and display aesthetics. Output: product selection + purchase + display mock setup.

name: Send Paul + glove maker latest prototype photos & technical specs to finalize next production run
notes: Take high-res photos + annotate changes, compile specs (materials, stitching, cuff, sizing). Output: email package to Paul + maker with clear revision list + approval ask.

name: Remove side metal D-ring + widen gauntlet cuffs (heavy jackets comfort)
notes: Prototype change: remove D-ring, widen cuff for jacket comfort; test mobility + safety. Output: revised pattern notes + decision to implement in next run.

name: Redesign back/waist straps (alligator clips or cross-back) so apron removable with helmet on
notes: Evaluate clip vs cross-back designs; focus on quick release + comfort. Output: chosen strap system + prototype request to maker.

name: Design + implement personalized Thank You cards
notes: Create card template (brand, handwritten space, QR to review). Decide printing method. Output: final design + print order + insertion process.

name: Order new custom stickers (Merakai Metal Works)
notes: Confirm sticker design, size, finish (matte/gloss), quantity, and vendor proof. Output: order placed + ETA tracked + count logged on arrival.

name: When XL sizes available: offer free with 100% discount coupon (@bigmikecustomsteel, @bryson.ward)
notes: Prepare coupon codes + shipping workflow. Once XL arrives, contact handles and ship with feedback request. Output: 2 shipments completed + content captured.

name: Let Carrie Lawhorn know when large gloves are ready
notes: Send update message when inventory is ready; offer reserved pair and preferred shipping. Output: confirmation + shipment scheduled.

name: When gloves arrive: send @cslacticitysteel coupon (apron $100 off + free gloves pair)
notes: Create coupon (apron $100 off + free gloves), confirm shipping info, and request post/pics. Output: coupon delivered + redemption tracked.

name: Glove boxes will arrive in 20 days
notes: Track box shipment ETA, confirm count/specs, prep packing station. Output: receiving checklist + storage plan + packaging timeline.

name: Kids Gloves Prototype Development
notes: Turn sizing research into patterns: sample build, fit testing with students, collect feedback, iterate. Output: approved prototype specs for production quote.

name: Product Roster Title Update
notes: Update site title/branding to '1898 Leather', verify favicon/header text, and deploy. Output: live page updated + quick QA checklist passed.

name: Research availability/sourcing of ring-spun FR cotton + aramid fabric
notes: Identify suppliers for ring-spun FR cotton + aramid blends, request swatches/pricing, note MOQ and lead times. Output: vendor shortlist + recommendation.

name: Consider finding a rep agency to sell 1898 products to other stores
notes: Find 3–5 rep agencies with welding/industrial footprint; compare terms, territories, and commission. Output: shortlist + outreach email draft.

name: Move feedback group chat WhatsApp → Instagram (include testers who avoid WhatsApp spam)
notes: Plan migration: list members, create IG group(s), set rules/pinning, and move key resources. Output: IG group live + WhatsApp sunset message.

name: Develop ladies size for gloves
notes: Collect sizing/fit feedback for women’s sizing, define new size chart, and prototype pattern changes. Output: proposed ladies fit spec + sample request.

name: Develop Heavy-Duty Blacksmith Gloves
notes: Research materials and reinforcement zones for blacksmith use, gather competitor benchmarks, draft spec sheet. Output: product concept + prototype plan.

name: Design Firefighter Gloves
notes: Assess firefighter requirements (FR standards, grip, dexterity), identify certification constraints, draft initial concept. Output: feasibility summary + next steps.

name: Design welding sleeves
notes: Define sleeve materials and size range, check sourcing/MOQ, and prototype attachment method. Output: spec + sample request list.

name: Research heat-resistant rubber or metal-clip solutions for thumb/index finger area
notes: Explore protective overlays/clips for thumb/index hot spots; test adhesion/comfort and durability. Output: 2–3 solution candidates + cost impact estimate.
